payload.name: CEO1
payload.purpose: Driving customer focused - not just listening, mine knowledge. If we have one hour to solve a problem, we spend 50 minutes on the the problem and we build options for solutions. Learning is what makes us finding good solutions.

payload.name: CEO
payload.purpose: Driving customer focused - not just listening, mine knowledge. If we have one hour to solve a problem, we spend 50 minutes on the the problem and we build options for solutions. Learning is what makes us finding good solutions.

payload.name: Inertia
payload.detect: We do not pay attention to this risk and we are biased towards "we are making the change", "we are the leaders": we do not look behind us seriously to see whether new entrants could disrupt us... and they will

payload.name: Legacy Operating System
payload.detect: We know we bought an "old" OS that is the right thing to do to be first on the market. But this is an obsolescence problem we will have to deal with

payload.name: Legacy Operating System
payload.detect: We know we bought an "old" OS that is the right thing to do to be first on the market. But this is an obsolescence problem we will have to deal with

payload.name: Lack of Quality
payload.detect: Pushing towards meeting milestones and being process driven will have detriment to Quality: we can see the first signals

payload.name: Innovation Driven
payload.detect: We are being successful so we should ensure some money is set aside for innovation

payload.name: Inertia
payload.detect:
We do not pay attention to this risk and we are biased towards "we are making the change", "we are the leaders": we do not look behind us seriously to see whether new entrants could disrupt us... and they will. 
In business, inertia refers to an organization’s unwillingness or inability to adapt to changing circumstances. The larger the inertia, the more force it takes to effect change.

payload.name: Entropy
payload.detect: Pushing towards meeting milestones and being process driven will generate entropy:  In business, we see that poorly managed companies become less organized and less focused over time

payload.name: B people
payload.detect: As we are going to grow, we will start hiring B people, and the B people will start hiring C people...
payload.respond: To create a learning culture; to ensure decisions are based on facts & data

payload.name: Decision Making
payload.detect: We do not have a decision making process. We do not base our decisions on facts or data: we base our decisions on consensus or "authority". We are easily convinced by a logical and well-presented speech. We do not assess the impact of your decisions

payload.name: Decision Making
payload.detect: We do not have a decision making process. We do not base our decisions on facts or data: we base our decisions on consensus or "authority". We are easily convinced by a logical and well-presented speech. We do not assess the impact of your decisions

payload.name: Echo Chamber Bias
payload.detect: This is confirmation bias when board of directors and the CEO think identically, reenforcing their position and refusing to change.
payload.respond: Appoint a devil’s advocate. Ask for external, neutral opinions. Perform pre- and post-mortem analyses.

payload.name: Quality
payload.detect: We are driven by Quality. But Quality like democracy does not come for free. We cannot take it for granted and in the split of the moment, we may realize Quality has gone
payload.assess: We are being pushed to meet deadlines and we are already cutting corners: that does not smell good.

payload.name: Legacy Operating System
payload.detect: We know we bought an "old" OS that is the right thing to do to be first on the market. But this is an obsolescence problem we will have to deal with

payload.name: CEO
payload.purpose: Empowering customers to succeed by deeply understanding their challenges and co-creating innovative solutions
